name: Colli Gage + Others!
description:
Colli Gage is my Game Design course practicum, combining all of my (good) projects I submitted throughout the semester. The main product, as the name suggests, is Colli Gage. The other projects in this semester I have included along with the game, most importantly ones that have contributed to the making of Colli Gage.

My motive for uploading this outside of class is because I actually put effort into this.

I got a 100 on colli gage btw :)

Files Include:

Colli Gage (Game)

SORTA Blast (Game)

SORTA Shmup (Game)

Breaking Through (Game)

PhysProj2 (Tech demo(?))

Particle Test (Tech demo)

I might've missed a couple others, though until I find out I do not care.
